item.title: Visual Representation Basics I
item.description: Contents Tweet of the day Slides Helpful Materials esquisse: ggplot2 add-in Tweet of the day Visual encoding is itself a data transformation, often applied after a chain of other transformations. This is ‚Äúfirst week of class‚Äù, table stakes stuff. Sad if true that we don‚Äôt internalize this! ‚Äî Jeffrey Heer (@jeffrey_heer) August 11, 2018 Enrico Bertini is a data visualization researcher at NYU who co-hosts (with Moritz Stefaner) the podcast ‚ÄúData Stories‚Äù, which I highly recommend.

item.title: Introduction to Visual Analytics
item.description: Contents Tweet of the day: Slides & Lab Tweet of the day: Any time I have been struggling to learn a new tool/technology/software ‚Ä¶ I go back to this short clip I cut out of ???'s 2014 ??? tutorial on Dplyr to motivate myself to keep pushing through ‚Ä¶ learning new tools is hard for everyone at the beginning! pic.twitter.com/RevpkSJqWc ‚Äî Aliakbar Akbaritabar (Ali) (@Akbaritabar) July 25, 2018 Hadley Wickham is the R guru amongst gurus.
